systems

Class SystemsTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • systems.SystemsTracker

  • public class SystemsTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Class managing a set of component bundles. This class is designed to construct the systems paired with the components in the component bundle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SystemsTracker() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasComponent(ComponentBundle c) 
      java.util.ArrayList<EntitySystem> systemsInUse() 
      void track(ComponentBundle b)
      adds b to the set of component bundles, representing the systems in use.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SystemsTracker

        public SystemsTracker()

    • Method Detail

      • systemsInUse

        public java.util.ArrayList<EntitySystem> systemsInUse()
        Returns:
        A list of newly constructed systems. For each component bundle stored, there is one system in this list.

      • hasComponent

        public boolean hasComponent(ComponentBundle c)
        Parameters:
        c - a given component bundle
        Returns:
        true if there is a component bundle stored with the same identifier as c

      • track

        public void track(ComponentBundle b)
        adds b to the set of component bundles, representing the systems in use. Precondition: no component bundle with the same identifier as b is stored already.
        Parameters:
        b - component bundle to track
